spells.name: Acid Splash
spells.description: You create an acidic bubble at a point within range, where it explodes in a 5-foot-radius Sphere. Each creature in that Sphere must succeed on a Dexterity saving throw or take 1d6 Acid damage.
spells.higher_levels: The damage increases by 1d6 when you reach levels 5 (2d6), 11 (3d6), and 17 (4d6).

spells.name: Blade Ward
spells.description: You weave protective magic around yourself. Until the spell ends, you have Resistance to Bludgeoning, Piercing, and Slashing damage.

spells.name: Chill Touch
spells.description: Channeling the chill of the grave, make a melee spell attack. On a hit, the target takes 1d10 Necrotic damage, and it can't regain Hit Points until the end of your next turn.
spells.higher_levels: The damage increases by 1d10 when you reach levels 5 (2d10), 11 (3d10), and 17 (4d10).

spells.name: Dancing Lights
spells.description: You create up to four torch-sized lights within range, making them appear as torches, lanterns, or glowing orbs that hover. You can combine the four lights into one glowing Medium form. Each light sheds Dim Light in a 10-foot radius. As a Bonus Action, you can move the lights up to 60 feet to a new point within range.

spells.name: Druidcraft
spells.description: Whispering to the spirits of nature, you create one of the following effects: predict weather, make a flower blossom, create sensory effects (leaf, puff of wind, sound), or instantly light or snuff out a small flame.

spells.name: Eldritch Blast
spells.description: A beam of crackling energy streaks toward a creature within range. Make a ranged spell attack against the target. On a hit, the target takes 1d10 Force damage.
spells.higher_levels: The spell creates more than one beam when you reach higher levels: two beams at level 5, three beams at level 11, and four beams at level 17. You can direct the beams at the same target or at different ones. Make a separate attack roll for each beam.

spells.name: Fire Bolt
spells.description: You hurl a mote of fire at a creature or object within range. Make a ranged spell attack against the target. On a hit, the target takes 1d10 Fire damage. A flammable object hit by this spell catches fire if it isn't being worn or carried.
spells.higher_levels: The damage increases by 1d10 when you reach levels 5 (2d10), 11 (3d10), and 17 (4d10).

spells.name: Friends
spells.description: You magically emanate a sense of friendship toward one creature you can see within range. The target must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw or have the Charmed condition for the duration. The target succeeds automatically if it isn't a Humanoid, if you're fighting it, or if you have cast this spell on it within the past 24 hours.

spells.name: Guidance
spells.description: You touch a willing creature and choose a skill. Until the spell ends, the creature adds 1d4 to any ability check using the chosen skill.

spells.name: Light
spells.description: You touch one object that is no larger than 10 feet in any dimension. Until the spell ends, the object sheds Bright Light in a 20-foot radius and Dim Light for an additional 20 feet. The light can be colored as you like.

spells.name: Mage Hand
spells.description: A spectral, floating hand appears at a point you choose within range. The hand lasts for the duration or until you dismiss it. The hand vanishes if it is ever more than 30 feet away from you or if you cast this spell again. You can use the hand to manipulate an object, open an unlocked door or container, stow or retrieve an item from an open container, or pour the contents out of a vial.

spells.name: Mending
spells.description: This spell repairs a single break or tear in an object you touch, such as a broken chain link, two halves of a broken key, a torn cloak, or a leaking wineskin. The break or tear can be no larger than 1 foot in any dimension.

spells.name: Message
spells.description: You point toward a creature within range and whisper a message. The target (and only the target) hears the message and can reply in a whisper that only you can hear. You can cast this spell through solid objects if you are familiar with the target and know it is beyond the barrier.

spells.name: Minor Illusion
spells.description: You create a sound or an image of an object within range that lasts for the duration. The illusion also ends if you dismiss it or cast this spell again. If you create an image of an object—such as a chair, muddy footprints, or a small chest—it must be no larger than a 5-foot Cube. A creature can examine the image with a successful Intelligence (Investigation) check against your spell save DC.

spells.name: Poison Spray
spells.description: You spray toxic mist at a creature within range. Make a ranged spell attack against the target. On a hit, the target takes 1d12 Poison damage.
spells.higher_levels: The damage increases by 1d12 when you reach levels 5 (2d12), 11 (3d12), and 17 (4d12).

spells.name: Prestidigitation
spells.description: This spell is a minor magical trick that novice spellcasters use for practice. You create one of the following magical effects: sensory effect, light/snuff candle, clean/soil object, chill/warm/flavor material, make symbol or mark, or create trinket/illusory image.

spells.name: Produce Flame
spells.description: A flickering flame appears in your hand and remains there for the duration. While there, the flame emits no heat and ignites nothing, and it sheds Bright Light in a 20-foot radius and Dim Light for an additional 20 feet. The spell ends if you dismiss it or cast it again. You can attack with the flame, making a ranged spell attack. On a hit, the target takes 1d8 Fire damage.
spells.higher_levels: The damage increases by 1d8 when you reach levels 5 (2d8), 11 (3d8), and 17 (4d8).

spells.name: Ray of Frost
spells.description: A frigid beam of blue-white light streaks toward a creature within range. Make a ranged spell attack against the target. On a hit, it takes 1d8 Cold damage, and its Speed is reduced by 10 feet until the start of your next turn.
spells.higher_levels: The damage increases by 1d8 when you reach levels 5 (2d8), 11 (3d8), and 17 (4d8).

spells.name: Resistance
spells.description: You touch one willing creature. Once before the spell ends, the target can add 1d4 to one saving throw of its choice. It can roll the die before or after making the saving throw. The spell then ends.

spells.name: Sacred Flame
spells.description: Flame-like radiance descends on a creature that you can see within range. The target must succeed on a Dexterity saving throw or take 1d8 Radiant damage. The target gains no benefit from Half Cover or Three-Quarters Cover for this saving throw.
spells.higher_levels: The damage increases by 1d8 when you reach levels 5 (2d8), 11 (3d8), and 17 (4d8).

spells.name: Shillelagh

components.material: mistletoe, a shamrock leaf, and a club or quarterstaff

spells.description: A club or quarterstaff you are holding is imbued with nature's power. For the duration, you can use your spellcasting ability instead of Strength for the attack and damage rolls of melee attacks using that weapon, and the weapon's damage die becomes a d8.

spells.name: Shocking Grasp
spells.description: Lightning springs from your hand to deliver a shock to a creature you try to touch. Make a melee spell attack against the target. You have Advantage on the attack roll if the target is wearing armor made of metal. On a hit, the target takes 1d8 Lightning damage, and it can't take Reactions until the start of its next turn.
spells.higher_levels: The damage increases by 1d8 when you reach levels 5 (2d8), 11 (3d8), and 17 (4d8).

spells.name: Spare the Dying
spells.description: Choose a creature within range that has 0 Hit Points and isn't dead. The creature becomes Stable.

spells.name: Starry Wisp
spells.description: You launch a mote of light at one creature or object within range. Make a ranged spell attack against the target. On a hit, the target takes 1d8 Radiant damage, and until the end of your next turn, it emits Dim Light in a 10-foot radius and can't benefit from the Invisible condition.
spells.higher_levels: The damage increases by 1d8 when you reach levels 5 (2d8), 11 (3d8), and 17 (4d8).

spells.name: Thaumaturgy
spells.description: You manifest a minor wonder, a sign of supernatural power, within range. You create one of the following effects: boom your voice, make flames flicker/brighten/dim, cause tremors, create sound, open/close door or window, or alter your eye appearance.

spells.name: Thorn Whip

components.material: the stem of a plant with thorns

spells.description: You create a long, vine-like whip covered in thorns that lashes out at a creature in range. Make a melee spell attack against the target. On a hit, the target takes 1d6 Piercing damage, and if the creature is Large or smaller, you can pull it up to 10 feet closer to you.
spells.higher_levels: The damage increases by 1d6 when you reach levels 5 (2d6), 11 (3d6), and 17 (4d6).

spells.name: Thunderclap
spells.description: You create a burst of thunderous sound that can be heard up to 100 feet away. Each creature in a 5-foot Emanation originating from you must succeed on a Constitution saving throw or take 1d6 Thunder damage.
spells.higher_levels: The damage increases by 1d6 when you reach levels 5 (2d6), 11 (3d6), and 17 (4d6).

spells.name: Toll the Dead
spells.description: You point at one creature you can see within range, and the sound of a dolorous bell fills the air around it for a moment. The target must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw or take 1d8 Necrotic damage. If the target is missing any of its Hit Points, it instead takes 1d12 Necrotic damage.
spells.higher_levels: The damage increases by one die when you reach levels 5 (2d8 or 2d12), 11 (3d8 or 3d12), and 17 (4d8 or 4d12).

spells.name: True Strike

components.material: a weapon with which you have proficiency and that is worth 1+ CP

spells.description: Guided by a flash of magical insight, you make one attack with the weapon used in the spell's casting. The attack uses your spellcasting ability for the attack and damage rolls instead of using Strength or Dexterity. If the attack deals damage, it can be Radiant damage or the weapon's normal damage type (your choice).
spells.higher_levels: The attack deals an extra 1d6 Radiant damage when you reach levels 5 (1d6), 11 (2d6), and 17 (3d6).
spells.notes_2024: True Strike has been completely redesigned in 2024 - it is now a weapon attack cantrip rather than a concentration spell.

spells.name: Vicious Mockery
spells.description: You unleash a string of insults laced with subtle enchantments at a creature you can see within range. The target must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw or take 1d6 Psychic damage and have Disadvantage on the next attack roll it makes before the end of its next turn.
spells.higher_levels: The damage increases by 1d6 when you reach levels 5 (2d6), 11 (3d6), and 17 (4d6).

spells.name: Word of Radiance
spells.description: Burning radiance erupts from you. Each creature of your choice in a 5-foot Emanation originating from you must succeed on a Constitution saving throw or take 1d6 Radiant damage.
spells.higher_levels: The damage increases by 1d6 when you reach levels 5 (2d6), 11 (3d6), and 17 (4d6).

spells.name: Mind Sliver
spells.description: You drive a disorienting spike of psychic energy into the mind of one creature you can see within range. The target must succeed on an Intelligence saving throw or take 1d6 Psychic damage and subtract 1d4 from the next saving throw it makes before the end of your next turn.
spells.higher_levels: The damage increases by 1d6 when you reach levels 5 (2d6), 11 (3d6), and 17 (4d6).
